mapper.select: select dev.id, case dev.idevtype WHEN '1' then '自动取款机' WHEN '2' then '自动存款机' WHEN '3' then '自动存取款机' WHEN '4' then '自动查询机' WHEN '5' then '多媒体终端' WHEN '6' then '个性化发卡机' WHEN '7' then '回单打印机' WHEN '8' then '智能现金柜' END AS deviceName, term.strtermnum AS termNo, dev.strdevmodel, dev.strdevmanu, term.organization from ssarun.device dev left join ssarun.term term on term.deviceid = dev.id where term.organization = #{model.organization}

select id ,strtermnum , case svcstatus WHEN '-1' then '无效' WHEN '0' then '空闲' WHEN '1' then '交易中' WHEN '2' then '硬件故障停止服务' WHEN '3' then '管理命令暂停服务' WHEN '4' then '维护中' WHEN '5' then '通讯中断' WHEN '6' then '耗材尽停止服务' WHEN '7' then '已关机' WHEN '8' then '正在重新启动' END AS svcstatus ,ihdwstatus, dtsvcstatusbegin,iagentstatus,vmcardreader,vmrfcardreader vmpinpad ,vmjournalprinter ,vmcashdispenser ,vmcashacceptor,vmreceiptprinter,vmstatementprinter, vmpassbookprinter,cashacceptorinfo,cashdispenserinfo,dccarddispenser from ssaview.termstatus where STRTERMNUM in
#{item}
select NFRT_ORG_NAME from t_nfrt_org where NFRT_ORG_ID =#{orgId} and NFRT_ORG_STATE ='1'

select device.id id, device.STRDEVMANU deviceVendor, -- 设备厂商id domaindict.STRVALUE deviceVendorName, -- 设备厂商名称 device.STRDEVMODEL deviceModel, -- 设备型号 concat(concat(concat(concat( ifnull(term.ORGANIZATION,'无'),'/'),ifnull(s.org_code,'无')),'/'),ifnull(bra.org_code,'无')) orgId, -- 所属机构号 term.STRTERMADDR address, -- 终端地址 device.firstinstalldate installationTime, -- 首次安装日期 term.STRTERMNUM terminalCode, -- 终端编号 case when device.IDEVTYPE = '1' then -- '设备类型：自动取款机 1，自动存款机 2，自动存取款机 3，自动查询机 4', '自动取款机' when device.IDEVTYPE = '2' then '自动存款机' when device.IDEVTYPE = '3' then '自动存取款机' when device.IDEVTYPE = '4' then '自动查询机' end deviceType, device.IDEVTYPE deviceTypeCode, case when device.ISTATUS = '0' then -- '设备状态：待签收设备 0，库存设备 1，停用未回库设备 2，拒收设备 3，上线设备 4，已报废设备 5', '待签收设备' when device.ISTATUS = '1' then '库存设备' when device.ISTATUS = '2' then '停用未回库设备' when device.ISTATUS = '3' then '拒收设备' when device.ISTATUS = '4' then '上线设备' when device.ISTATUS = '5' then '已报废设备' end deviceStatus, concat(concat( concat( concat(concat(concat(bank.STRBANKNAME,'/'),s.STRSUBBRANCHNAME),'/'),bra.STRBRANCHNAME ),'/'),se.STRSSBNAME) orgName
from ssarun.device device left join ssarun.term term on term.DEVICEID = device.id left join ssarun.domaindict domaindict on domaindict.STRNAME = device.STRDEVMANU left join ssamgt.subbranch s on s.org_code = term.ORGANIZATION left join ssamgt.bank bank on bank.STRBANKNUM = s.STRBANKNUM left join ssamgt.branch bra on bra.STRBRANCHNUM = s.STRBRANCHNUM left join ssamgt.selfsvcbank se on se.STRBRANCHNUM = bra.STRBRANCHNUM where term.STRTERMNUM = #{id}

select
case when termstatus.CASHACCEPTORINFO ='-1' then -- 存款箱状态：无效 -1，正常 0，存款钞多 1，存款钞满 2 '无效' when termstatus.CASHACCEPTORINFO ='0' then '正常' when termstatus.CASHACCEPTORINFO ='1' then '存款钞多' when termstatus.CASHACCEPTORINFO ='2' then '存款钞满' else '正常' end depositStatus, case when termstatus.CASHDISPENSERINFO ='-1' then -- '取款箱状态：无效 -1，正常 0，取款钞少 1，取款钞尽 2', '无效' when termstatus.CASHDISPENSERINFO ='0' then '正常' when termstatus.CASHDISPENSERINFO ='1' then '取款钞少' when termstatus.CASHDISPENSERINFO ='2' then '取款钞尽' else '正常' end withDrawalsStatus,
termstatus.VMPINPAD passWordStatus,
case when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='-1' then -- 服务状态 '无效 : -1,空闲: 0,交易中 : 1,硬件故障停止服务 : 2,管理命令暂停服务 : 3,维护中 : 4,通讯中断: 5,耗材尽停止服务: 6,已关机 : 7,正在重新启动 : 8' '无效' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='0' then '空闲' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='1' then '交易中' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='2' then '硬件故障停止服务' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='3' then '管理命令暂停服务' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='4' then '维护中' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='5' then '通讯中断' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='6' then '耗材尽停止服务' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='7' then '已关机' when termstatus.SVCSTATUS ='8' then '正在重新启动' else '正常' end serviceStatus
from ssaview.termstatus termstatus where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode}

select case when vendorpersonnel.MANUEMPNATURE ='1' then '服务主管' else '服务工程师' end userType, vendorpersonnel.NAME AS name, vendorpersonnel.TELEPHONE phone from ssamgt.vendorpersonnel vendorpersonnel where vendorpersonnel.DEVICEMANU = #{deviceVendor} and vendorpersonnel.MANUEMPNATURE='1'
SELECT d.DEVICEID, m.ID, m.CLASSID, m.DCNAME, m.DCDESC, m.VERSIONNUM FROM ssarun.devicedc d LEFT JOIN ssarun.devicecontroller m ON d.dcId = m.ID WHERE d.DEVICEID = #{deviceId}

select case when LOCATE('CARD',termstatus.VMCARDREADER ) >0 then -- '读卡器状态：CARD 读卡器故障, CARDJAM 读卡器卡被卡住, CARDBIN 读卡器回收盒满', '读卡器故障' when LOCATE('CARDJAM',termstatus.VMCARDREADER ) >0 then '读卡器卡被卡住' when LOCATE('CARDBIN',termstatus.VMCARDREADER ) >0 then '读卡器回收盒满' when termstatus.VMCARDREADER ='-1' then '无效' else termstatus.VMCARDREADER end status,
"读卡器" name
from ssaview.termstatus termstatus where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode} union all select
case when termstatus.VMRFCARDREADER ='-1' then '无效' else termstatus.VMRFCARDREADER end status,
"射频读卡器" name
from ssaview.termstatus termstatus where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode} union all select
case when LOCATE('CARDINDI',termstatus.DCCardReaderIndi ) >0 then -- '个性化读卡器状态：CARDINDI 读卡器故障, CARDINDIJAM 读卡器卡被卡住, CARDINDIBIN 读卡器回收盒满', '个性化读卡器故障' when LOCATE('CARDINDIJAM',termstatus.DCCardReaderIndi ) >0 then '个性化读卡器卡被卡住' when LOCATE('CARDINDIBIN',termstatus.DCCardReaderIndi ) >0 then '个性化读卡器回收盒满' when termstatus.DCCardReaderIndi ='-1' then '无效' else termstatus.DCCardReaderIndi end status,
"个性化读卡器" name from ssaview.termstatus termstatus where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode}

SELECT case when termstatus.VMRECEIPTPRINTER ='REC' then -- '凭条打印机状态：REC 凭条打印机故障，RECPEPT 缺凭条纸，RECPJAM 凭条打印机卡纸', '凭条打印机故障' when termstatus.VMRECEIPTPRINTER ='RECPEPT' then '缺凭条纸' when termstatus.VMRECEIPTPRINTER ='RECPJAM' then '凭条打印机卡纸' else termstatus.VMRECEIPTPRINTER end status, "凭条打印机" name from ssaview.termstatus termstatus left join ssarun.term term on term.STRTERMNUM = termstatus.STRTERMNUM left join ssarun.device dev on dev.id = term.DEVICEID where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode} union all SELECT
case when termstatus.VMSTATEMENTPRINTER ='DOC' then -- '对帐单打印机状态：DOC 对帐单打印机故障，DOCPEPT 缺对账单纸，DOCPJAM 对帐单打印机卡纸', '对帐单打印机故障' when termstatus.VMSTATEMENTPRINTER ='DOCPEPT' then '缺对账单纸' when termstatus.VMSTATEMENTPRINTER ='DOCPJAM' then '对帐单打印机卡纸' else termstatus.VMSTATEMENTPRINTER end status, "对帐单打印机" name
from ssaview.termstatus termstatus left join ssarun.term term on term.STRTERMNUM = termstatus.STRTERMNUM left join ssarun.device dev on dev.id = term.DEVICEID where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode} union all select termstatus.VMPASSBOOKPRINTER status, -- 存折打印机状态 "存折打印机" name
from ssaview.termstatus termstatus left join ssarun.term term on term.STRTERMNUM = termstatus.STRTERMNUM left join ssarun.device dev on dev.id = term.DEVICEID left join ssamgt.vendorpersonnel ven on ven.DEVICEMANU = dev.STRDEVMANU where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode} union all select
case when termstatus.VMJOURNALPRINTER ='JRN' then -- '流水打印机状态：JRN 流水打印机故障，JRNPEPT 缺流水纸，JRNPJAM 流水打印机卡纸', '流水打印机故障' when termstatus.VMJOURNALPRINTER ='JRNPEPT' then '缺流水纸' when termstatus.VMJOURNALPRINTER ='JRNPJAM' then '流水打印机卡纸' else termstatus.VMJOURNALPRINTER end status, "流水打印机" name from ssaview.termstatus termstatus left join ssarun.term term on term.STRTERMNUM = termstatus.STRTERMNUM left join ssarun.device dev on dev.id = term.DEVICEID where termstatus.STRTERMNUM = #{terminalCode}
